ev_longname.en: Photo Only (no BG, no UCR, Inklimit=200 )

comments.en: Prints with full Usage of Color. Black will be mixed up with Color Toner. Not usefull for Text or large Black areas.

ev_longname.en: Photo and Text (low BG, low UCR, Inklimit=200 )

comments.en: Prints without adding Color to Black. Makes sharp Text and colorfull Photos.

ev_longname.en: Color Graphic and Text (BG, UCR, Inklimit=150 )

comments.en: Best mode for every day printing. Also useable for Photos, but reduces Color from under the black Pixels. Very dark areas will printed with black only. Produces nice Gray without Color shining.

Usefull when printig a lot and want to save some Toner. The Quality is good enought for every Day Photo or Graphic printig (i.e. Flyer, Postcards, CD-Cover, etc.). Uses UnderColorReduction and Black Generation.
